Base theme for all Westegg themes that include core plugins, configuration, and MDX support.

## Getting Started

- Try out the [demo](http://core.westegg.xyz)
- Copy the starter from the [repo](http://repo.westegg.xyz/tree/master/starters/westegg-core)

  ```
  git clone git@github.com:adrwxyz/westegg.git
  cp -r westegg/starters/westegg-core new-site
  cd new-site
  npm install
  npm run-script build
  ```
